text: James Cyril Bolger (February 23, 1932 - April 9, 2020) was an American professional baseball outfielder. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. He appeared in 312 games over all or parts of seven Major League Baseball (MLB) seasons. He played for the Chicago Cubs, Cincinnati Reds, Cleveland Indians and Philadelphia Phillies. Bolger died on April 9, 2020 at the age of 88.Purcell all-state athlete, Cincinnati Reds outfielder Jim Bolger dead at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Sportspeople from Cincinnati
title: Jim Bolger (baseball)
